unicef-ch12.def: Percentage of children under age 5 with symptoms of pneumonia (cough and fast or difficult breathing due to a problem in the chest) in the two weeks preceding the survey for whom advice or treatment was sought from a health facility or provider.
unicef-ch12.name: Pneumonia care seeking for children with symptoms of Acute Respiratory Infection
unicef-ch12.source: DHS, MICS and other national household surveys. Last update: January 2021.
unicef-ch12.dataset: DHS, MICS and other national household surveys. Last update: January 2021.
